sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact', templateUrl: './contact.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact.component.css'] }) export class ContactComponent implements OnInit { constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void { } contactForm = new FormGroup({ name: new FormControl("",[Validators.required,Validators.minLength(2),Validators.pattern("[a-zA-Z].*")]), email: new FormControl("",[Validators.required,Validators.email]), address: new FormControl("",[Validators.required,Validators.minLength(2),Validators.pattern("[a-zA-Z].*")]), mobile: new FormControl("",[Validators.required,Validators.pattern("[0-9]*"), Validators.minLength(10), Validators.maxLength(10)]), message: new FormControl("",[Validators.required]) }); submit(){ console.log(this.contactForm.get( "name")); } get name():FormControl{ return this.contactForm .get("name") as FormControl; } get email():FormControl{ return this.contactForm .get("email") as FormControl; } get address():FormControl{ return this.contactForm .get("address") as FormControl; } get mobile():FormControl{ return this.contactForm .get("mobile") as FormControl; } get message():FormControl{ return this.contactForm .get("message") as FormControl; } }

Get In Touch

Name is required
Name is to short

email is required
email is invalid
Address is required
Address is to short
Address should start with Alphabet
number is required
only Number
Number is short
Number is short
Message is required
